title: Full-Stack Software Developer (intern)
snapshot: Took over a partially built property management platform and launched a stable MVP with a clean, performant backend and responsive UI. Built CMS tools for admins and added booking, real-time messaging and rental application features. Mentored two junior devs through Jira sprints, code reviews and pair programming.
description: Took over a partially built property management platform and led it to a successful MVP launch with a maintainable, cohesive codebase.
Refactored legacy Django logic, improved API performance, and reduced tech debt across backend services.
Built a responsive React + Tailwind dashboard managing 20+ properties and 50+ users, with CMS tools for admins and staff.
Introduced real-time messaging, booking, and rental application features to extend platform capabilities.
Mentored two junior interns through Jira task planning, pair programming, and code reviews.
